${ModID}:BloodLust.NAME: Blood Lust
${ModID}:BloodLust.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal damage, you deal 1 more damage until the end of your turn.

${ModID}:HeatBlood.NAME: Heat Blood
${ModID}:HeatBlood.DESCRIPTION: Cause !aqualancemod:D2! HP loss. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:DualAttack.NAME: Dual Attack
${ModID}:DualAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Cause !aqualancemod:D2! HP loss.

${ModID}:IceWall.NAME: Ice Wall
${ModID}:IceWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Ice Spikes.

${ModID}:Slash.NAME: Slash
${ModID}:Slash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:Flurry.NAME: Flurry
${ModID}:Flurry.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage an additional time for each debuff on the target.

${ModID}:FlingDebris.NAME: Fling Debris
${ModID}:FlingDebris.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:WaveMotion.NAME: Wave Motion
${ModID}:WaveMotion.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! damage.

${ModID}:IronWave.NAME: Iron Wave
${ModID}:IronWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! Block.

${ModID}:IceWave.NAME: Icy Wave
${ModID}:IceWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Ice Spikes. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! aqualancemod:Ice Spikes.

${ModID}:RideTheWave.NAME: Ride The Wave
${ModID}:RideTheWave.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL aqualancemod:Bonus: !aqualancemod:M2! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Wave. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
NL Apply !aqualancemod:D2! aqualancemod:Ice Spikes to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Pressure.NAME: Pressure
${ModID}:Pressure.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! aqualancemod:Mark for every debuff. NL Trigger aqualancemod:Mark.

${ModID}:SappingShard.NAME: Sapping Shard
${ModID}:SappingShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy deals !M! less damage.

${ModID}:BattlemageShard.NAME: Battlemage Shard
${ModID}:BattlemageShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you attack this enemy, cause !aqualancemod:D2! HP loss.

${ModID}:Water Blast.NAME: Water Blast
${ModID}:Water Blast.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PickOff.NAME: Pick Off
${ModID}:PickOff.DESCRIPTION: Base damage is !M! per enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

${ModID}:Rapids.NAME: Rapids
${ModID}:Rapids.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card this turn, draw 1 card and randomly discard 1 card.

${ModID}:Fog.NAME: Fog
${ModID}:Fog.DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals !M! less damage this turn.

${ModID}:Feint.NAME: Feint
${ModID}:Feint.DESCRIPTION: Target deals !M! less damage this turn. NL Draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:PommelParry.NAME: Pommel Parry
${ModID}:PommelParry.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card. NL Discard a card.

${ModID}:SirenSigil.NAME: Siren Sigil
${ModID}:SirenSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Enemies do !M! less damage with attacks this turn.

${ModID}:InscribedSigil.NAME: Inscribed Sigil
${ModID}:InscribedSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Mark to ALL enemies. NL Trigger aqualancemod:Mark on ALL enemies.

${ModID}:IceSlam.NAME: Ice Slam
${ModID}:IceSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Pop 1: Apply !M! aqualancemod:Ice Spikes.

${ModID}:Engulf.NAME: Engulf
${ModID}:Engulf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL aqualancemod:Pop 1:Deal !D! damage 2 times.

${ModID}:SteamBlast.NAME: Steam Blast
${ModID}:SteamBlast.DESCRIPTION: Cause 4 !aqualancemod:H! HP loss. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable

${ModID}:SteamExplosion.NAME: Steam Explosion
${ModID}:SteamExplosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Pop 1: Apply !M! Weak, Hobble, and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:JumpKick.NAME: Jump Kick
${ModID}:JumpKick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has at least 3 debuffs, NL gain [E] , draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:Momentum.NAME: Momentum
${ModID}:Momentum.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain 1 aqualancemod:Haste.

${ModID}:ExtendedThrust.NAME: Extended Thrust
${ModID}:ExtendedThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card. NL Discard a card next turn.

${ModID}:LeechShard.NAME: Leech Shard
${ModID}:LeechShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:IceShard.NAME: Ice Shard
${ModID}:IceShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: No Effect. NL aqualancemod:Popped: No Effect.

${ModID}:ExplosiveShard.NAME: Explosive Shard
${ModID}:ExplosiveShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Pops itself in 3 turns. NL aqualancemod:Popped: Deal !M! damage.

${ModID}:CatalystShard.NAME: Catalyst Shard
${ModID}:CatalystShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Whenever you apply a debuff to this enemy, they lose !M! HP.

${ModID}:InscribedShard.NAME: Inscribed Shard
${ModID}:InscribedShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy gains !M! aqualancemod:Mark at the start of its turn. NL aqualancemod:Popped: Trigger aqualancemod:Mark.

${ModID}:DecayShard.NAME: Decay Shard
${ModID}:DecayShard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL aqualancemod:Embed: Enemy takes !M! % more damage.

${ModID}:Reckless.NAME: Reckless
${ModID}:Reckless.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and aqualancemod:Intelligence. NL Lose !aqualancemod:M2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:Hedge.NAME: Hedge
${ModID}:Hedge.DESCRIPTION: If you end your turn with a Sigil in hand, draw !M! extra card next turn.
${ModID}:Hedge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL If you end your turn with a Sigil in hand, draw !M! extra card next turn.

${ModID}:Spray.NAME: Spray
${ModID}:Spray.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Discard your entire hand.
${ModID}:Spray.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Discard your entire hand.

${ModID}:IceMastery.NAME: Ice Mastery
${ModID}:IceMastery.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Pop effects happen an extra time.

${ModID}:Streamline.NAME: Streamline
${ModID}:Streamline.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Draw 1 card next turn.
${ModID}:Streamline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Draw 1 card the next !M! turns.

${ModID}:Jettison.NAME: Jettison
${ModID}:Jettison.DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Discard 1 card next turn. NL Gain !M! Vigor.
${ModID}:Jettison.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard 1 card. NL Discard 1 card the next 2 turns. NL Gain !M! Vigor.

${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.NAME: Whirlpool Sigil
${ModID}:WhirlpoolSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! aqualancemod:Soaked to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SnowSigil.NAME: Snow Sigil
${ModID}:SnowSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! Weak to the enemy with the highest HP.

${ModID}:HailSigil.NAME: Hail Sigil
${ModID}:HailSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to the enemy with the lowest HP.

${ModID}:Flak.NAME: Flak
${ModID}:Flak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block whenever you discard a card.

${ModID}:WildMagic.NAME: Wild Magic
${ModID}:WildMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you discard a card, cause !M! HP loss to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Speed.NAME: Speed
${ModID}:Speed.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.
${ModID}:Speed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! card and discard !M! card.

${ModID}:FierceSkewer.NAME: Fierce Skewer
${ModID}:FierceSkewer.DESCRIPTION: Can only target enemies with at least !M! debuffs. NL Deal !D! damage.

${ModID}:BloodBender.NAME: Blood Bender
${ModID}:BloodBender.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Finisher. NL Deal !D! damage for each aqualancemod:Shard.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Enemy doesn't have any shards embedded.

${ModID}:WildStabs.NAME: WildStabs
${ModID}:WildStabs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply !aqualancemod:M2! Weak and Vulnerable.
${ModID}:WildStabs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply !aqualancemod:M2! Weak, aqualancemod:Hobble, and Vulnerable.

${ModID}:ColdHearted.NAME: Cold Hearted
${ModID}:ColdHearted.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply !M! debuffs in one turn, gain 1 aqualancemod:Haste.
${ModID}:ColdHearted.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you apply !M! debuffs in one turn, gain 1 aqualancemod:Haste.

${ModID}:WaterBurst.NAME: Water Burst
${ModID}:WaterBurst.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Cause !aqualancemod:D2! HP loss !M! times.

${ModID}:MarshSigil.NAME: Marsh Sigil
${ModID}:MarshSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Apply !M! poison to all enemies.

${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.NAME: Tsunami Sigil
${ModID}:TsunamiSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Cause !M! HP loss for ALL aqualancemod:Sigils discarded this combat (!aqualancemod:D2! HP Loss).

${ModID}:GeyserSigil.NAME: Geyser Sigil
${ModID}:GeyserSigil.DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Sigil. NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies in 3 turns.

${ModID}:ElementalForm.NAME: Elemental Form
${ModID}:ElementalForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence.
${ModID}:ElementalForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: aqualancemod:Replenish. NL Whenever you apply a debuff, gain !M! aqualancemod:Intelligence.
